insert into <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> ( ODI_PK, ODI_SESS_NO, ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE, ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT ) select SYS_GUID(), '<?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_GUID") ?>', rowid, 'F', 'ODI-15063: The alternate key W_ORDERS_F_UK1 is not unique.', '(45)Oracle Partition Exchange Load Demo.Configuration #3 - IKM Oracle Control Append - Load By Partition - Flow Control (Same as Configuration #2)', sysdate, 'W_ORDERS_F_UK1', 'AK', W_ORDERS_F.ORDER_NUM, W_ORDERS_F.ORDER_DT, W_ORDERS_F.STATUS_WID, W_ORDERS_F.CUST_WID, W_ORDERS_F.PRODUCT_WID, W_ORDERS_F.REVENUE_AMT, W_ORDERS_F.CREATED_DT, W_ORDERS_F.UPDATED_DT from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> W_ORDERS_F where exists ( select SUB.CUST_WID, SUB.ORDER_NUM from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> SUB where SUB.CUST_WID=W_ORDERS_F.CUST_WID and SUB.ORDER_NUM=W_ORDERS_F.ORDER_NUM group by SUB.CUST_WID, SUB.ORDER_NUM having count(1) > 1 )

create table <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> ( ODI_ROW_ID UROWID, ODI_ERR_TYPE <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "1") ?> NULL, ODI_ERR_MESS <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "250") ?> NULL, ODI_CHECK_DATE <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE") ?> NULL, ORDER_NUM VARCHAR2(12) NULL, ORDER_DT DATE NULL, STATUS_WID NUMBER NULL, CUST_WID NUMBER NULL, PRODUCT_WID NUMBER NULL, REVENUE_AMT NUMBER NULL, CREATED_DT DATE NULL, UPDATED_DT DATE NULL, ODI_ORIGIN <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "250") ?> NULL, ODI_CONS_NAME <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "128") ?> NULL, ODI_CONS_TYPE <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2") ?> NULL, ODI_PK <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "32") ?> PRIMARY KEY, ODI_SESS_NO <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "36") ?> )

insert into <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> ( ODI_PK, ODI_SESS_NO, ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE, ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT ) select SYS_GUID(), '<?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_GUID") ?>', rowid, 'F', 'ODI-15066: The column REVENUE_AMT cannot be null.', sysdate, '(45)Oracle Partition Exchange Load Demo.Configuration #3 - IKM Oracle Control Append - Load By Partition - Flow Control (Same as Configuration #2)', 'REVENUE_AMT', 'NN', ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> where REVENUE_AMT is null

create table <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "SNP_CHECK_TAB", "W") ?> ( CATALOG_NAME <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100") ?> NULL , SCHEMA_NAME <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100") ?> NULL , RESOURCE_NAME <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100") ?> NULL, FULL_RES_NAME <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100") ?> NULL, ERR_TYPE <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "1") ?> NULL, ERR_MESS <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "250") ?> NULL , CHECK_DATE <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE") ?> NULL, ORIGIN <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "250") ?> NULL, CONS_NAME <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "128") ?> NULL, CONS_TYPE <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2") ?> NULL, ERR_COUNT <?=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "10") ?> NULL )

insert into <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> ( ODI_PK, ODI_SESS_NO, ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE, ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT ) select SYS_GUID(), '<?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_GUID") ?>', rowid, 'F', '', sysdate, '(45)Oracle Partition Exchange Load Demo.Configuration #3 - IKM Oracle Control Append - Load By Partition - Flow Control (Same as Configuration #2)', 'W_ORDERS_F_CHK5', 'CK', ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> W_ORDERS_F where not ( CUST_WID IS NOT NULL )

insert /*+ APPEND */ into <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "W_ORDERS_F", "Warehouse", "", "D", "P", "#A_TEAM.PARTITION_MONTH") ?> ( ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT ) select ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?>

insert into <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> ( ODI_PK, ODI_SESS_NO, ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE, ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT ) select SYS_GUID(), '<?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_GUID") ?>', rowid, 'F', 'ODI-15066: The column ORDER_NUM cannot be null.', sysdate, '(45)Oracle Partition Exchange Load Demo.Configuration #3 - IKM Oracle Control Append - Load By Partition - Flow Control (Same as Configuration #2)', 'ORDER_NUM', 'NN', ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> where ORDER_NUM is null

insert into <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> ( ODI_PK, ODI_SESS_NO, ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE, ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT ) select SYS_GUID(), '<?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_GUID") ?>', rowid, 'F', '', sysdate, '(45)Oracle Partition Exchange Load Demo.Configuration #3 - IKM Oracle Control Append - Load By Partition - Flow Control (Same as Configuration #2)', 'W_ORDERS_F_CHK8', 'CK', ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> W_ORDERS_F where not ( REVENUE_AMT < 10000000 )

insert /*+ APPEND */ into <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> ( ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT ) select ORDERS_1.ORDER_NUM, ORDERS_1.ORDER_DT, W_STATUS_D.ROW_WID, W_CUSTOMER_D_1.ROW_WID, W_PRODUCT_D.ROW_WID, ORDERS_1.PRICE * ORDERS_1.QUANTITY, ORDERS_1.CREATED_DT, ORDERS_1.UPDATED_DT from ((( SELECT ORDERS.ORDER_NUM ORDER_NUM , ORDERS.ORDER_DT ORDER_DT , ORDERS.ORDER_STATUS ORDER_STATUS , ORDERS.CUST_ID CUST_ID , ORDERS.PROD_ID PROD_ID , ORDERS.QUANTITY QUANTITY , ORDERS.PRICE PRICE , ORDERS.CREATED_DT CREATED_DT , ORDERS.UPDATED_DT UPDATED_DT FROM <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "ORDERS", "Staging", "D") ?> ORDERS WHERE (ORDERS.ORDER_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('#A_TEAM.PARTITION_MONTH','#A_TEAM.PartitionDateFormat') AND LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('#A_TEAM.PARTITION_MONTH','#A_TEAM.PartitionDateFormat')) AND '#A_TEAM.FLOW_TABLE_OPTIMIZER_HINT' = '#A_TEAM.FLOW_TABLE_OPTIMIZER_HINT' ) ) ORDERS_1 LEFT OUTER JOIN <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "W_STATUS_D", "Warehouse", "D") ?> W_STATUS_D ON ORDERS_1.ORDER_STATUS = W_STATUS_D.STATUS_CD ) LEFT OUTER JOIN <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "W_PRODUCT_D", "Warehouse", "D") ?> W_PRODUCT_D ON ORDERS_1.PROD_ID = W_PRODUCT_D.PROD_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT W_CUSTOMER_D.ROW_WID ROW_WID , W_CUSTOMER_D.CUST_ID CUST_ID , W_CUSTOMER_D.CURRENT_FLAG CURRENT_FLAG FROM <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "W_CUSTOMER_D", "Warehouse", "D") ?> W_CUSTOMER_D WHERE (W_CUSTOMER_D.CURRENT_FLAG = #A_TEAM.DefaultType2CurrentFlag ) ) W_CUSTOMER_D_1 ON ORDERS_1.CUST_ID = W_CUSTOMER_D_1.CUST_ID where (1=1)

insert into <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> ( ODI_PK, ODI_SESS_NO, ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE, ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT ) select SYS_GUID(), '<?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_GUID") ?>', rowid, 'F', '', sysdate, '(45)Oracle Partition Exchange Load Demo.Configuration #3 - IKM Oracle Control Append - Load By Partition - Flow Control (Same as Configuration #2)', 'W_ORDERS_F_CHK3', 'CK', ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> W_ORDERS_F where not ( ORDER_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-JAN-2014', 'DD-MON-YYYY') AND TO_DATE('31-DEC-2014', 'DD-MON-YYYY') )

delete from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "SNP_CHECK_TAB", "W") ?> where SCHEMA_NAME = '<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' and ORIGIN = '(45)Oracle Partition Exchange Load Demo.Configuration #3 - IKM Oracle Control Append - Load By Partition - Flow Control (Same as Configuration #2)' and ERR_TYPE = 'F'

insert into <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> ( ODI_PK, ODI_SESS_NO, ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE, ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT ) select SYS_GUID(), '<?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_GUID") ?>', rowid, 'F', '', sysdate, '(45)Oracle Partition Exchange Load Demo.Configuration #3 - IKM Oracle Control Append - Load By Partition - Flow Control (Same as Configuration #2)', 'W_ORDERS_F_CHK6', 'CK', ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> W_ORDERS_F where not ( CUST_WID IS NOT NULL )

insert into <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> ( ODI_PK, ODI_SESS_NO, ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE, ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT ) select SYS_GUID(), '<?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_GUID") ?>', rowid, 'F', 'ODI-15066: The column STATUS_WID cannot be null.', sysdate, '(45)Oracle Partition Exchange Load Demo.Configuration #3 - IKM Oracle Control Append - Load By Partition - Flow Control (Same as Configuration #2)', 'STATUS_WID', 'NN', ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> where STATUS_WID is null

insert into <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> ( ODI_PK, ODI_SESS_NO, ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE, ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT ) select SYS_GUID(), '<?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_GUID") ?>', rowid, 'F', '', sysdate, '(45)Oracle Partition Exchange Load Demo.Configuration #3 - IKM Oracle Control Append - Load By Partition - Flow Control (Same as Configuration #2)', 'W_ORDERS_F_CHK7', 'CK', ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> W_ORDERS_F where not ( REVENUE_AMT > 0 )

insert into <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> ( ODI_PK, ODI_SESS_NO, ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE, ORDER_NUM, ORDER_DT, STATUS_WID, CUST_WID, PRODUCT_WID, REVENUE_AMT, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT ) select SYS_GUID(), '<?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_GUID") ?>', rowid, 'F', 'ODI-15064: The primary key W_ORDERS_F_PK is not unique.', '(45)Oracle Partition Exchange Load Demo.Configuration #3 - IKM Oracle Control Append - Load By Partition - Flow Control (Same as Configuration #2)', sysdate, 'W_ORDERS_F_PK', 'PK', W_ORDERS_F.ORDER_NUM, W_ORDERS_F.ORDER_DT, W_ORDERS_F.STATUS_WID, W_ORDERS_F.CUST_WID, W_ORDERS_F.PRODUCT_WID, W_ORDERS_F.REVENUE_AMT, W_ORDERS_F.CREATED_DT, W_ORDERS_F.UPDATED_DT from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> W_ORDERS_F where exists ( select SUB.ORDER_NUM from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> SUB where SUB.ORDER_NUM=W_ORDERS_F.ORDER_NUM group by SUB.ORDER_NUM having count(1) > 1 )

delete from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> T where exists ( select 1 from <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%ERR_PRFW_ORDERS_F", "W") ?> E where ODI_SESS_NO = '<?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_GUID") ?>' and T.rowid = E.ODI_ROW_ID )
